rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with eco-friendly lighting and a water recycling system for rainwater collection, designed according to Vastu principles for energy flow.
An open-plan living room with sustainable materials and ample natural light, aligning with Vastu for auspicious energy.
A modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and water-saving fixtures. Kitchen is positioned in the south-east corner as per Vastu recommendations.
A dining area integrated with the living room for seamless flow of space.
First bedroom featuring a spacious balcony with greenery and eco-friendly materials. Balcony designed in the north-west direction for positive energy.
Second bedroom with a balcony ensuring privacy and ample ventilation. Designed according to Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated private gym area with eco-friendly flooring and ventilation. Utilizes sustainable equipment.
A compact bathroom using water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly materials.

openings.description: Main entrance door made from recycled materials with solar-powered sensors.
Large windows on the south and west facades to maximize natural light while keeping energy efficiency in mind.
Roof vents installed on the rooftop terrace to ensure proper ventilation and temperature regulation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an expansive balcony offering panoramic views and greenery, designed to enhance relaxation per Vastu.
A study room with ample natural light and eco-friendly workstations.
A well-organized closet area integrated with sustainable storage solutions.
Master ensuite bathroom designed for comfort with water-saving fixtures and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Balcony access door with eco-friendly glazing for privacy and natural light.

rooms.description: A serene rooftop terrace with green spaces and solar panels for energy generation, designed in accordance with Vastu for harmony.

openings.description: Access door to the rooftop terrace with secure locking and eco-friendly construction.
